title: Marianna Vyshemirsky: 'My picture was used to spread lies about the war'
description: A pregnant woman fleeing a bombed maternity hospital was targeted by a Russian disinformation campaign.

title: Anti-abortion groups target women with misleading ads

title: Will swapping out electric car batteries catch on?
description: One Chinese carmaker has plans for thousands of stations in Europe where you can switch batteries.

title: Man with guide dog twice refused access by Tesco

title: Northern Ireland: Could the EU and UK face a trade war?
description: As tensions build over Northern Ireland, concerns of an EU-UK trade war have surfaced.

title: Open-top bus parade as Stockport seal return to Football League
description: Thousands of fans turn out to celebrate Stockport County's return to the Football League.

description: Russian forces make little progress but more war crimes are uncovered.

title: Why Jake Daniels coming out is a watershed moment

description: Julia James' smartwatch and a chance previous encounter helped her colleagues catch her killer.

title: Harry Styles' new album Harry's House charms music critics

title: McDonald's to leave Russia for good after 30 years

title: Full lunar eclipse creates rare super blood Moon

title: Focus on female farmers in Northumberland and the Scottish Borders
